example_sentence_italian: La pasta è pronta per cena.
example_sentence_english: The pasta is ready for dinner.

notes: can mean a pastry or a serving
example_sentence_italian: Vorrei una pasta e un caffè.
example_sentence_english: I would like a pastry and a coffee.

notes: used for the dish or mass noun
plural form; often refers to pastries

example_sentence_english: The pastries are on the tray.

example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato delle paste al forno.
example_sentence_english: I bought some pastries at the bakery.

example_sentence_italian: Il sapore della pasta è ottimo.
example_sentence_english: The flavor of the pasta is excellent.
I added sauce to the pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Ho servito il sugo alle paste.
example_sentence_english: I served the sauce to the pastries.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto il basilico dalla pasta.
example_sentence_english: I removed the basil from the pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Le briciole sono cadute dalle paste.
example_sentence_english: The crumbs fell from the pastries.
There is a tomato in the pasta.
I found fruit in the pastries.
I put Parmesan on the pasta.
There is sugar on the pastries.

example_sentence_italian: Mangio un contorno con la pasta.
example_sentence_english: I eat a side dish with the pasta.

example_sentence_italian: Ho servito caffè con le paste.
example_sentence_english: I served coffee with the pastries.

notes: nonstandard; 'col' is not used with feminine nouns
example_sentence_italian: 'Col pasta' è scorretto; si dice 'con la pasta'.
example_sentence_english: 'Col pasta' is incorrect; you say 'con la pasta'.

notes: nonstandard; 'coi' is not used with feminine nouns
example_sentence_italian: 'Coi paste' è scorretto; si dice 'con le paste'.
example_sentence_english: 'Coi paste' is incorrect; you say 'con le paste'.
